titles.title: Superfund Liability Exemption for Local Education Agencies Act
To amend the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to restrict the liability under that Act of local educational agencies.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

bill.summary: 3/20/1997--Introduced. Superfund Liability Exemption for Local Education Agencies Act - Amends the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to absolve any local educational agency from liability for costs or damages under the Act, by reason of solid municipal waste generation or transportation, if the amount and toxicity of the substances in such waste do not exceed that which a reasonable person would expect to find in such waste generated by the agency.
